AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account.

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the Bing Ads account.

AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the Bing Ads account.

TimePeriod.description: The time period for the report data.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the ad group.

Keyword.description: The keyword associated with the report data.

KeywordId.description: The unique identifier for the keyword.

Goal.description: The goal achieved in the report.

Assists.description: The number of conversions in which the keyword assisted.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all conversions.

GoalId.description: The unique identifier for the goal.

DeviceType.description: The type of device used when the event occurred.

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device used when the event occurred.

AccountStatus.description: The status of the Bing Ads account.

AdGroupStatus.description: The status of the ad group.

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions.

AllConversionsQualified.description: The number of conversions that meet specific qualification criteria.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of view-through conversions that meet specific qualification criteria.

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from view-through conversions.
